trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of extensions for a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia uma coleção de extensões de uma <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified extension to the collection of extensions.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a extensão especificada à coleção de extensões.

trans-unit.source: When this overload is used, each workflow instance that requests this extension type will get the extension instance provided to this method.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa sobrecarga é usada, cada instância de fluxo de trabalho que solicita esse tipo de extensão obterá a instância de extensão fornecida para este método.

trans-unit.source: If each workflow instance should have its own instance of the extension, use the other <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: Se cada instância de fluxo de trabalho deve ter sua própria instância da extensão, use o outro <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> sobrecarga.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma da <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> sobrecargas são chamadas após <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, uma <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: The type of extension to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de extensão para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The method that creates the extension.
trans-unit.target: O método que cria a extensão.

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see cref="T:System.Func`1" /> that is used to provide an instance of an extension when requested by a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Registra uma <see cref="T:System.Func`1" /> que é usada para fornecer uma instância de uma extensão quando solicitado por uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When this overload is used, each workflow instance that requests this extension type will get a new instance of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa sobrecarga é usada, cada instância de fluxo de trabalho que solicita esse tipo de extensão receberá uma nova instância da extensão.

trans-unit.source: If a singleton extension is desired, use the other <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar fazer uma extensão de singleton, use o outro <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> sobrecarga.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma da <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> sobrecargas são chamadas após <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, uma <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: Marks the collection of extensions as read-only.
trans-unit.target: Marca a coleção de extensões como somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a workflow host is prepared for execution.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um host de fluxo de trabalho está preparado para a execução.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma da <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> sobrecargas são chamadas após <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, uma <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.
